author: he852100
body:
Expected
```powershell
PS > Test-Connection 163.com

   Destination: 163.com

Ping Source           Address                   Latency BufferSize Status
                                                   (ms)        (B)
---- ------           -------                   ------- ---------- ------
   1 localhost        123.58.180.8                   55         32 Success
   2 localhost        123.58.180.8                   50         32 Success
   3 localhost        123.58.180.8                   63         32 Success
   4 localhost        123.58.180.8                   49         32 Success
```
```powershell
PS /root> Test-Connection 15.8.8.4 -TcpPort 56
False
```
Results
```powershell
PS > Test-Connection 163.com

   Destination: 163.com

Ping Source           Address                   Latency BufferSize Status
                                                   (ms)        (B)
---- ------           -------                   ------- ---------- ------
   1 localhost        *                               *          * TimedOut
   2 localhost        *                               *          * TimedOut
   3 localhost        *                               *          * TimedOut
   4 localhost        *                               *          * TimedOut
```
```powershell
PS /root> Test-Connection 15.8.8.4 -TcpPort 56
True
```
----
```powershell
PS /root> ip add|grep -P "t .+tu"
    inet 26.26.26.1/30 scope global tun0
```
```
PSVersion                      7.0.0-daily.20191210
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.0.0-daily.20191210
OS                             Linux 4.9.112-perf #1 SMP …
Platform                       Unix
```
title: [My bug report]Test-Connection cannot return correct results when using tun
